snippet.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet Live-Action Trailer- Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Raccoon Logic dropped a live-action trailer for Revenge of The Savage Planet during the Spring Showcase, which concerne the Ding Ding Influencer Accelerator Program, or D.I.A.P.E.R. for short. The chaotic co-op action adventure is coming to PC, PlayStation and Xbox on May 8. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #Revengeofthesavageplanet 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
